item.description:
I haven't schedule a movie meetup in a while. I've been sick, so that doesn't help. I still haven't seen Avatar and I've been told that I should. Let's try for one of the 3D shows. Can anyone else make it on Saturday night (February 6)?

The movie starts at 7:45 PM at Showcase on Saturday night. Let's meet in the Worcester Showcase lobby at 7:15. Remember, we're going to see Avatar in 3-D. Not the regular old 2-D show. Showcase lets you purchase tickets online, so feel free to do that if you like.

If you're going to be late, or you need to contact me for any other reason, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Avatar in 3D
